name: Eva Ness' Farewell European Tour
description:
Controls

Left/Right - Move, Z/C/B - Jump, X/V/N - Run
Up/Down - Climb Ladders

Hold Down + Jump to fall through platforms.

Story

Eva's off on holiday before Brexit kicks in and makes it so much harder to get around Europe.

Guide Eva around the Alps, Barcelona, Paris and Malmo, taking holiday photos on the way.

Just watch out for that Ape.
